evidence.claim: Magellan Healthcare utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring that health information is handled securely.
Integration with FHIR standards is mentioned in their API documentation.
They support various X12 EDI transaction sets for healthcare exchanges.

icp.icp_reason: Magellan Healthcare engages in X12 transactions and values EDI/API for healthcare data exchange.
